meanings.definition: A person or company that promotes or sells products or services.
meanings.sent1: The marketer displayed the new products in the store window.
meanings.sent2: The marketer created an advertising campaign to increase sales.
meanings.sent3: The marketer joked that selling ice to polar bears would be easier.
meanings.sent4: She was a skilled marketer, turning even the most mundane items into must-haves.
meanings.sent5: The marketer's enthusiasm for the products was contagious.

meanings.sent1: She will marketer the new line of cosmetics at the event.
meanings.sent2: They decided to marketer their services through social media.
meanings.sent3: He marketered the idea of selling sand in the desert.
meanings.sent4: The company marketered their brand with a catchy jingle.
meanings.sent5: In order to succeed, she knew she had to marketer effectively.
